    Welcome. Salut. مرحبا.

    Waleed Khamies

    Waleed Khamies is an applied machine learning scientist and on the PhD track at the University of Alberta, specializing in AI and healthcare. His research focuses on neural biomarkers in mental health conditions and developing secure AI models to support their care.

    Learn More
    What I Stand For

    My Values and Principles

    My values are the core of who I am. They shape how I make decisions, build relationships, and pursue my goals. By sharing them, I hope to connect with people who share similar beliefs and are inspired by the same ideals.
